title: The Man who stops accidents
creator_contributor_role: Technical and Scientific Films, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Management - Study and teaching
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Industrial accidents
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Safety education, Industrial
description: Although most managements take precautions to prevent foreseeable accidents, they are still common, a very large percentage being caused by personal carelessness. In this film, the duties of the foreman in accident prevention are stressed. It goes on to show a series of "typical" accidents and "puts the clock back" on them to show how they could have been prevented.
